# PCDM
[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/pcdm.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/pcdm)

Property Casualty Data Model

SQLAlchemy implementation of [OMG Property Casualty Data Model](https://www.omg.org/spec/PC/About-PC/)

![](docs/pcdmcdm.png)

### Installation

Run pip install:

```
pip install pcdm
```
